lines.text: ... I wanna play something for you. It's not finished yet, but... I don't know, I just kinda want you to...

[thinking]
... get naked?
...hear it anyway.
[Todd starts singing 4 lines of a sad song]

[thinking]
He sang with passion, he sang with pain...
[Todd finished singing]

[thinking]
... he sang for about 20 seconds!

[thinking]
I was such a bitch! I can't believe I did that... to my friend! I felt so guilty, I felt so bad!... I felt like trying to find Todd!
[walking away from school]

[thinking]
Ok, so what if it was a one-night stand! Couldn't we still be friends? And if we were friends... couldn't we maybe have sex again?

[writing a letter]
Dear Mr. Sparrow. Thank you for having sex with me.

[singing]
And I will release you from all of your torment, stir up trouble that you can't ignore, and I'll tell the world, I'll tell them a story, tell a story to the world, about a girl...

[thinking]
Say something! Say something!
[out loud]
Say something!
You better watch it, you're becoming a groupie...
Oh my god. I think these are street people. I saw a whole Sally Jessie on them.
Oh, dude. That is no street person.
That's the guy from the Color Green.
The color what?... What color?
Green.

[Stares at Andrea silently]
You had sex didn't you? Well talk to me you big slut, how was it?
Disappointing. I wish I'd saved it.

Oh, no way. You gotta get that first one over with. That way when it really counts, you're not sitting there the whole time going, "I'm not a virgin anymore, I'm not a virgin anymore." Think of it as a warm-up.

[voice over]
Hi, I'm not a virgin anymore.
[out loud]
Goodnight.
Goodnight, dear.
What I didn't understand was why was this boy a part of me? What did he have that I wanted? What did he have that I needed? and Why was I incomplete without him?
If it was in your soul to do it, then fate would just take you there. And everything else was just a test to see if you were the real thing.

[pause]
Are you the real thing, Andrea?
Yes... I am.

[voice over]
And then, God created man. And I wanted to thank her right then and there for the snake, the apple, and the free will to mess up the entire world.
I'm gonna dedicate my record to you
Why?
Because you're my inspiration.Because you're everything I've ever wanted to be.
Cybil, what do you mean? What am I? I'm nothig!
You're everything!
